name: Gauge Capital
description: Gauge Capital is a private equity firm focused on investing in and growing middle-market companies across various sectors. Founded in 2015 and based in Fort Worth, Texas, Gauge Capital specializes in leveraging its extensive industry experience and operational expertise to help portfolio companies achieve their growth potential. The firm seeks to partner with management teams to implement strategic initiatives, enhance operational efficiencies, and drive revenue growth. Gauge Capital's investment strategy emphasizes a collaborative approach, allowing them to create value through a blend of financial resources and hands-on guidance. The firm is committed to building long-term relationships with its portfolio companies, fostering a culture of performance and accountability. Gauge Capital has a proven track record of successful investments in industries such as healthcare, technology, consumer products, and more, aiming to generate significant returns for its investors while contributing positively to the communities in which they operate.
